MessagePleaseRefreshPage: Genindlæs venligst denne side for at modtage nye opdateringer fra serveren.

LabelPathSubstitutionHelp: Valgfri: Stisubstitution kan sammenkæde serverstier til netværksstier som klienter derved kan tilgå for direkte afspilning.

MessageInstallPluginFromApp: Dette plugin skal være installeret inde i den app du ønsker at benytte det fra.
MessageFeatureIncludedWithSupporter: You are registered for this feature, and will be able to continue using it with an active Emby Premiere subscription.
MessageChangeRecurringPlanConfirm: Efter denne transaktion er udført skal du afmelde din tidligere løbende donation inde fra din PayPal konto. Tak fordi du støtter Emby.
MessageEmbyAccountAdded: Emby kontoen er blevet tilføjet til denne bruger.
MessagePendingEmbyAccountAdded: Emby kontoen er blevet tilføjet denne bruger. En email sendes til ejeren af kontoen. Invitationen skal bekræftes ved at klikke på linket i emailen.
MessageEmbyAccontRemoved: Emby kontoen er blevet fjernet fra denne bruger.
ExternalPlayerPlaystateOptionsHelp: Specificer hvordan du gerne vil genoptage afspilningen af denne video næste gang.
HeaderIfYouLikeCheckTheseOut: Hvis du kan lide {0}, så tjek disse...
WebClientTourContent: Se dit seneste tilføjet media, kommende episoder samt mere. Den grønne cirkel indikerer hvor mange uafspillet elementer du har.
WebClientTourMovies: Afspil film, trailere samt andet fra hvilken som helst enhed med en browser
WebClientTourMouseOver: Hold musen over enhver plakat for hurtig adgang til vigtig information
WebClientTourTapHold: Tryk og hold eller højreklik på enhver plakat for at åbne en menu for det valgte element
WebClientTourMetadataManager: Klik på rediger for at åbne metadata manageren
WebClientTourPlaylists: Opret afspilningslister og instant mixes, og afspil dem på enhver enhed
WebClientTourCollections: Opret filmsamlinger så film kan grupperes sammen
WebClientTourUserPreferences1: Brugerindstillinger gør det muligt for dig at skræddersy måden dit bibliotek præsenteres i alle dine Emby apps
WebClientTourUserPreferences2: Konfigurer sproget på dine lyd og undertekstindstillinger én gang for alle Emby apps
WebClientTourUserPreferences3: Design webklient hjemmesiden til din egen smag
WebClientTourUserPreferences4: Vælg baggrunde, temasange og eksterne afspillere
WebClientTourMobile1: Webklienten virker perfekt på smartphones og tablets...
WebClientTourMobile2: og styr let andre enheder og Emby apps
WebClientTourMySync: Synkroniser dine personlige mediefiler til dine enheder så det kan ses offline.
DashboardTourDashboard: Betjeningspanelet gør det muligt at monitorere din server og dine brugere. Du vil altid være i stand til at vide hvem der gør hvad samt hvor de er.
DashboardTourHelp: Hjælp inde i app'en sørger for knapper der let åbner de wiki-sider der er relateret til hvad der er på din skærm i det øjeblik.
DashboardTourUsers: Opret let brugerkonti til dine venner og familie, hver med deres egne rettigheder, adgang til biblioteket, forældre-indstillinger samt meget mere.
DashboardTourCinemaMode: Biograftilstand giver dig biografoplevelsen direkte ind i din stue, med muligheden for at vise trailere og brugerdefinerede introduktioner før hovedfilmen.
DashboardTourChapters: Aktiver kapitelbillede-oprettelse for dine videoer for en mere behagelig præsentation mens du afspiller.
DashboardTourSubtitles: Download automatisk undertekster til dine videoer in ethvert sprog.
DashboardTourPlugins: Installer tilføjelser så som internet videokanaler, live tv, metadata skannere samt meget mere.
DashboardTourNotifications: Send automatisk notifikationer vedrørende serverbegivenheder til dine mobile enheder, din email samt andre tjenester.
DashboardTourScheduledTasks: Administrer let processer der løber over længere tid via planlagte opgaver. Bestem hvornår de udføres samt hvor ofte.
DashboardTourMobile: Emby betjeningspanelet virker uden problemer på både smartphones og tablets. Kontrol over din server er altid ved dine fingrespidser hvor som helst, når som helst.
DashboardTourSync: Synkroniser dine personlige mediefiler til dine enheder så det kan ses offline.
DeleteDeviceConfirmation: Er du sikker på du ønsker at slette denne enhed? Den vil dukke op igen næste gang en bruger logger ind med den.
LabelEnableCameraUploadForHelp: Uploads sker automatisk i baggrunden når du er logget på Emby
ErrorMessageStartHourGreaterThanEnd: Slut tid skal være større end start tid.
MessageInvitationSentToUser: En email er blevet sendt til {0}, hvori de er blevet anmodet om at acceptere din invitation.
MessageInvitationSentToNewUser: En email er blevet sendt til {0} med en invitation til at oprette sig hos Emby.

MessagePluginConfigurationRequiresLocalA: For at konfigurerer dette plugin log da venligst direkte ind på din lokale server.
MessageLoggedOutParentalControl: Adgang er begrænset på nuværende tidspunkt. Prøv igen senere.
DefaultErrorMessage: Det opstod en fejl ved behandlingen af forespørgslen. Prøv igen senere.
MessageContactAdminToResetPassword: Kontakt venligst din systemadministrator for at nulstille din adgangskode.
MessageForgotPasswordInNetworkRequired: Prøv igen inde i dit hjemmenetværk for at igangsætte nulstilling af din adgangskode.

MessageInvalidForgotPasswordPin: En ugyldig eller udløbet pinkode blev indtastet. Prøv igen.
MessagePasswordResetForUsers: Passwords have been removed for the following users. To login, sign in with a blank password.
MessageConnectAccountRequiredToInviteGue: For at invitere gæster skal du først kæde din Emby konto til denne server.
CancelSyncJobConfirmation: Afbrydelse af synkroniseringen vil fjerne medier fra enheden under næste synkroniseringsproces. Er du sikker på du ønsker at fortsætte?
MessagePleaseSelectDeviceToSyncTo: Vælg en enhed at synkroniserer til.
OptionAutomaticallySyncNewContentHelp: New content added to will be automatically synced to the device.
OptionSyncUnwatchedVideosOnlyHelp: Kun usete videoer vil blive synkroniseret, og videoer vil blive fjernet fra enheden når de er blevet set.
LabelItemLimitHelp: Valgfri. Sæt en grænse for antallet af filer der synkroniseres.
MessageUnsetContentHelp: Indhold vil blive vist som almindelige mapper. For det bedste resultat benyt metadata manageren til at vælge indholdstypen i undermapper.
EmbyIntroDownloadMessage: For at downloade og installere Emby besøg {0}.
MessageUnlockAppWithPurchaseOrSupporter: Unlock this feature with a small one-time purchase, or with an active Emby Premiere subscription.
MessageUnlockAppWithSupporter: Unlock this feature with an active Emby Premiere subscription.
MessageToValidateSupporter: If you have an active Emby Premiere subscription, simply sign into the app once using your Wifi connection within your home network.
MessagePaymentServicesUnavailable: Betalingsservicen er ikke tilgængelig på nuværende tidspunkt. Prøv igen senere.
MessagePleaseSignInLocalNetwork: Før du fortsætter bedes du sikre dig at du har forbindelse til dit lokale netværk via Wifi eller Lan forbindelse.
MessageLiveTvGuideRequiresUnlock: Live TV Guiden er på nuværende tidspunkt begrænset til {0} kanaler. Klik på "Lås op" knappen for at få mere at vide omkring hvordan du kan få den fulde oplevelse.
MessageWeDidntRecognizeCommand: We're sorry, we didn't recognize that command.
MessageIfYouBlockedVoice: If you denied voice access to the app you'll need to reconfigure before trying again.
ErrorMessagePasswordNotMatchConfirm: The password and password confirmation must match.
ErrorMessageUsernameInUse: The username is already in use. Please choose a new name and try again.
ErrorMessageEmailInUse: The email address is already in use. Please enter a new email address and try again, or use the forgot password feature.
MessageThankYouForConnectSignUp: Thank you for signing up for Emby Connect. An email will be sent to your address with instructions on how to confirm your new account. Please confirm the account and then return here to sign in.
ButtonShareHelp: Share a web page containing media information with social media. Media files are never shared publicly.
MessageConfirmDeleteTunerDevice: Are you sure you wish to delete this device?
MessageConfirmDeleteGuideProvider: Are you sure you wish to delete this guide provider?
ErrorAddingTunerDevice: There was an error adding the tuner device. Please ensure it is accessible and try again.
ErrorSavingTvProvider: There was an error saving the TV provider. Please ensure it is accessible and try again.
ErrorGettingTvLineups: There was an error downloading tv lineups. Please ensure your information is correct and try again.
ErrorPleaseSelectLineup: Please select a lineup and try again. If no lineups are available, then please check that your username, password, and postal code is correct.
MessageDidYouKnowCinemaMode: Did you know that with Emby Premiere, you can enhance your experience with features like Cinema Mode?
MessageDidYouKnowCinemaMode2: Cinema Mode gives you the true cinema experience with trailers and custom intros before the main feature.
HeaderSyncRequiresSupporterMembership: Sync requires an active Emby Premiere subscription.
HeaderSyncRequiresSupporterMembershipApp: Sync requires connecting to an Emby Server with an active Emby Premiere subscription.
ErrorValidatingSupporterInfo: There was an error validating your Emby Premiere information. Please try again later.
ForAdditionalLiveTvOptions: For additional Live TV providers, click on the External Services tab to see the available options.
ConfirmEndPlayerSession: Would you like to close Emby on the device?
MessageEmbyForAndroidHasMoved: Emby for Android has moved to a new home in the app store. Please consider checking out the new app. You may continue to use this app for as long as you wish.
LoginDisclaimer: Emby is designed to help you manage your personal media library, such as home videos and photos. Please see our terms of use. The use of any Emby software constitutes acceptance of these terms.
TryMultiSelectMessage: To edit multiple media items, just click and hold any poster and select the items you want to manage. Try it!
TryDragAndDropMessage: To re-arrange playlist items, just drag and drop. Try it!
MessageTryMicrosoftEdge: For a better experience on Windows 10, try the new Microsoft Edge Browser.
MessageTryModernBrowser: For a better experience on Windows, try a modern web browser such as Google Chrome, Firefox, or Opera.
ErrorAddingListingsToSchedulesDirect: There was an error adding the lineup to your Schedules Direct account. Schedules Direct only allows a limited number of lineups per account. You may need to log into the Schedules Direct website and remove others listings from your account before proceeeding.
PleaseAddAtLeastOneFolder: Please add at least one folder to this library by clicking the Add button.
ErrorAddingMediaPathToVirtualFolder: There was an error adding the media path. Please ensure the path is valid and the Emby Server process has access to that location.
ErrorRemovingEmbyConnectAccount: There was an error removing the Emby Connect account. Please ensure you have an active internet connection and try again.
ErrorAddingEmbyConnectAccount: There was an error adding the Emby Connect account. Please ensure the Emby account has been activated by following the instructions in the email sent after creating the account. If this email was not received please send an email to apps@emby.media from the email address used with the Emby account.
PleaseConfirmPluginInstallation: Please click OK to confirm you've read the above and wish to proceed with the plugin installation.
MessagePluginInstallDisclaimer: Plugins built by Emby community members are a great way to enhance your Emby experience with additional features and benefits. Before installing, please be aware of the effects they may have on your Emby Server, such as longer library scans, additional background processing, and decreased system stability.
ThankYouForTryingEnjoyOneMinute: Please enjoy one minute of playback. Thank you for trying Emby.
MobileSyncFeatureDescription: Sync your media to your smart phones and tablets for easy offline access.
CoverArtFeatureDescription: Cover Art creates fun covers and other treatments to help you personalize your media images.
CloudSyncFeatureDescription: Sync your media to the cloud for easy backup, archiving, and converting.
FreeAppsFeatureDescription: Enjoy free access to select Emby apps for your devices.
CinemaModeFeatureDescription: Cinema Mode gives you the true cinema experience with trailers and custom intros before the feature.
